turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about History of the Jews in Morocco.
turn.1: What was the impact of the French colonization of Morocco on the Jews who stayed?
turn.2: In the outlying areas, particularly in the Atlas region where there were large concentrations of Jews of early origin, the Jews wielded great influence in both the political and spiritual domains.
turn.3: What other influence did they have?
turn.5: Can you tell me more about the cultural impact?
turn.6: The study of Kabbalah, as well as philosophy, was then in vogue.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: The last Moroccan philosopher of the Middle Ages was Judah b.
turn.9: Who was the last person left in Morocco?
turn.10: Nissim ibn Malkah, who was still alive in 1365.
turn.12: The last ruler of the Marinid dynasty, Abd al-Haqq II, appointed many Jews to high positions.
